ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 37
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was at the Orc Totem last night with a group of six players all around level 9.  I don t know if the experience came from the fabled 25% bonus, or a side
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:35 AM 07/01/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
>
>I mentioned the experience bonus with a group and one
>of the members said he asked 5 GMs and that the bonus
>doesn't exist.
>
>Belgarth Wolfstrider

I was at the Orc Totem last night with a group of six players all around
level 9. I don't know if the experience came from the fabled 25% bonus, or
a side effect of having greater forces take on greater odds, but we all
racked up on xp.

Interesting side note: I could swear the orcs were spawning much faster
there with a group of six than when I'd been there with groups of 3 or 4.
This may have been due to the lastest patch or something though.

-Pennaggolan, 11th (Yay!) level Wizard of Felwithe
